name: delete-files
description: A simple CFEngine Build module for making sure files do not exist.

delete-files.description: Allows you to specify a list of files you want deleted on hosts in your infrastructure. When this module is deployed as part of your policy set, every time CFEngine runs, it will check if those files exist, and delete them if they do.

input.label: Files

subtype.label: Why
subtype.question: Why should this file be deleted?

input.while: Specify another file you want deleted on your hosts?
